trans-unit.source: Creating web service endpoints in Machine Learning | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Creating web service endpoints in Machine Learning | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Creating web service endpoints in Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Creating web service endpoints in Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Creating Endpoints
trans-unit.target: Creating Endpoints

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning allows you to create multiple endpoints for a published web service.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning allows you to create multiple endpoints for a published web service.

trans-unit.source: Each endpoint is individually addressed, throttled and managed, independently of the other endpoints of that web service.
trans-unit.target: Each endpoint is individually addressed, throttled and managed, independently of the other endpoints of that web service.

trans-unit.source: There is a unique URL and authorization key for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: There is a unique URL and authorization key for each endpoint.

trans-unit.source: This allows Azure Machine Learning users to create web services that they can then sell forward to their customers.
trans-unit.target: This allows Azure Machine Learning users to create web services that they can then sell forward to their customers.

trans-unit.source: Each endpoint can be individually customized with its own trained models while still being linked to the experiment which created this webservice.
trans-unit.target: Each endpoint can be individually customized with its own trained models while still being linked to the experiment which created this webservice.

trans-unit.source: In addition, any updates to the experiment can be selectively applied to an endpoint without overwriting the customizations.
trans-unit.target: In addition, any updates to the experiment can be selectively applied to an endpoint without overwriting the customizations.

trans-unit.source: Endpoint Creation Steps
trans-unit.target: Endpoint Creation Steps

trans-unit.source: Open [http://manage.windowsazure.com](http://manage.windowsazure.com), click **Machine Learning** in the left column.
trans-unit.target: Open [http://manage.windowsazure.com](http://manage.windowsazure.com), click **Machine Learning** in the left column.

trans-unit.source: Click the workspace which has the web service you’re interested in.
trans-unit.target: Click the workspace which has the web service you’re interested in.

trans-unit.source: ![Navigate to workspace](./media/machine-learning-create-endpoint/figure-1.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Navigate to workspace](./media/machine-learning-create-endpoint/figure-1.png)

trans-unit.source: Click the **Web Services** tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Web Services** tab.

trans-unit.source: ![Navigate to web services](./media/machine-learning-create-endpoint/figure-2.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Navigate to web services](./media/machine-learning-create-endpoint/figure-2.png)

trans-unit.source: Click the web service you're interested in to see the list of available endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Click the web service you're interested in to see the list of available endpoints.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to endpoint
trans-unit.target: Navigate to endpoint

trans-unit.source: Click the **Add Endpoint** button at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Add Endpoint** button at the bottom.

trans-unit.source: Fill in a name and description, ensure there are no other endpoints with the same name in this web service.
trans-unit.target: Fill in a name and description, ensure there are no other endpoints with the same name in this web service.

trans-unit.source: Leave the throttle level with its default value unless you have special requirements.
trans-unit.target: Leave the throttle level with its default value unless you have special requirements.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about throttling, see [Scaling API Endpoints](machine-learning-scaling-endpoints.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn more about throttling, see [Scaling API Endpoints](machine-learning-scaling-endpoints.md).

trans-unit.source: ![Create endpoint](./media/machine-learning-create-endpoint/figure-4.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create endpoint](./media/machine-learning-create-endpoint/figure-4.png)

trans-unit.source: Once the endpoint is created, you can consume it through synchronous APIs, batch APIs, and excel worksheets.
trans-unit.target: Once the endpoint is created, you can consume it through synchronous APIs, batch APIs, and excel worksheets.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using Machine Learning web services, see [How to consume a published Azure Machine Learning web service](machine-learning-consume-web-services.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about using Machine Learning web services, see [How to consume a published Azure Machine Learning web service](machine-learning-consume-web-services.md).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
